name: Perfect Turkey Gravy
ingredients: 1/2 cup butter or fat drippings from the turkey roasting pan
4 cups (32 oz) turkey stock, pan drippings or chicken stock (add the stock COLD to hot rue)
1. Melt butter or fat drippings in a sauce pan
2. Add flour and stir to combine cooking over moderate heat until golden brown
3. Add stock and pan dripping and heat to a simmer (bubbles will break the surface of the sauce). Please
4. Allow the sauce to simmer lightly to cook out the starch from the roux (20 min)
5. Adjust the thickness by further reducing the sauce or adding additional stock (turn down heat)
6. Finish the sauce by adding the cream and stirring to combine
7. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
steps: -­‐to tell it is done it should cover the back of the spoon
note that the sauce will not begin to thicken until it simmers.
Note: sauce made with stock, gravy is made with pan drippings. Flour will congeal at 165, more you cook
flour the less thickening power it has.
